transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Sachin sir good morning kaise hain?
Executive: Good morning badhiya sir. Ji main Ashraf baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke head office se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ji main keh raha hun sir kaam kuch lead weed aa rahi hai proper ki nahi abhi aapke paas abhi aapki services boost hui thi recently.
Customer: Sir lead kya aa rahi hai ek ek pole ki inquiry aa rahi hai unko mera koi benefit hi nahi hai.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Haan ek pole mein to bhai utne ka to transportation lag jayega jitne ka aapka saman hoga.
Customer: Nahi usse jyada hi lag jayega kyunki inquiry bhi sari door door ki hai nazdeek ki to koi aa hi nahi rahi na.
Customer: Wo wo mere ko lead mein fayda hi nahi hai ek ek ek ek pole bechunga to bas maine fir IndiaMART ka fayda kya hai mere ko kal meri wo hamare jo ye dekh rahe shayad koi Simran madam hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Unse bhi baat hui thi.
Customer: Ab wo ab wo bhi ab wo bolti hai ki bhai aap isko jab tak consume nahi karoge jab tak aur lead aani shuru nahi hongi mere khayal se to aisa hona nahi chahiye ab ab ek single single pole ki lead aa rahi hai usko main consume kyun karunga ye batao na mere ko apni jo meri lead agar thoda bahut order aayega 25 pole 30 pole 50 pole tab to mere ko consume bhi kiya hai main dil le raha hun.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Aur jabki maine main main category jo hai sirf octagonal pole high mast pole dalwai hai.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Theek hai ab isme in aur usme feeder panel la rahe hain feeder panel jabki maine maine dalwaya hi nahi. Kya kya aa raha hai sir kya aa raha hai ek minute ko dekh leta hun aapke product mein na. Kya naam bata rahe ho aap?
Customer: Feeder panel.
Executive: Panel type par koi cheez ek minute panel per kuch nahi hai aapke mein.
Customer: Aap spelling fir se spell karna sir?
Customer: Control panel.
Executive: Achha control panel type ka cheez. Aisa to kuch nahi hai sir profile mein 22 hi product hai mere mere paas mere paas lead aa rahi hai sir control panel.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Control panel ki aapke usme dekh leta hun by lead consumption mein to nahi hai koi aisa.
Executive: Lightning tower RCC pole ko hataya hai Bajaj lighting poles ko hataya hai aapne.
Customer: Nahi aisa to nahi dikh raha abhi bhi by lead section mein bhi as such koi lead dikh nahi rahi mujhe.
Executive: Chaliye koi baat nahi sir haan hold ko.
Customer: Aur dusra kya hai mere paas jab se ek hafte se upar chalu ho gaya ek ek bhi direct call nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ek ek call aayi thi bas.
Executive: Call aane mein sir abhi time lagega aap agar soch rahe ho ki bhar bhar ke call aane lagegi to baki log jo itne time se IndiaMART pe hai unka kya hoga abhi jab aapki visibility achchi banegi abhi jo hai aapki website ki to ranking bhi as such kuch khas nahi aayi hogi sir thoda time to lagta hi hai iske promotion mein.
Executive: Dheeme dheeme jab aapka by lead ka consumption badhega visibility badhegi to call aur inquiry ka flow fir badhega.
Customer: Ab aap ye dekhiye na agar abhi abhi aap dekh rahe abhi aap dekh rahe ho.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To ye dekhiye mere paas jitni bhi inquiry hai shuru se abhi tak.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Chahe wo abhi Shahjahanpur ki Firozabad ki hai aap sab pe dekhiye ek piece do piece se upar kisi pe nahi hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ye sir jaise do teen call aapke paas maine dekha West Bengal se aayi hai starting mein to matlab unhone kya kara inquir kiya unko chahiye tha product bas inquiry kiya kya.
Executive: Sir wo sir wo jo call aayi thi wo different product ki thi.
Customer: Different product ki thi?
Executive: Haan ji unko unko sirf unke paas material rakha hua tha usko GI karana hai unko bas.
Executive: Oh ho achha.
Customer: Haan. Achha achha okay okay.
Customer: To ab ye bataiye us cheez ka kya fayda. Sir sahi bilkul aur dekhte hain isme kya hai ek bar pehle main aapke dekho sare product dekh raha hun 22 product hai theek hai. Flag pole.
Customer: Bolie.
Customer: Jo ye mere search product mein aap jayenge update mein ab ye dekhiye inhone ye LED aviation light. Haan haan. Iska price only 1400 1400 hona chahiye 40000 dala hua hai. To sir sahi karwaiye na ya khud se sahi kariye 1400 kar dun?
Customer: Haan isko 1400 kar dijiye. Kar diya. Isko to mere ko khud hi change karna padega ya to.
Executive: Haan. Are aap kar sakte ho ye panel hi aapke liye banaya gaya hai sir website to aapki buyer ko dikhti hai lekin ye jo panel hai ye aapke liye banaya gaya hai ki aap apne hisab se product ka naam likh sako apne hisab se detail dal sako apne hisab se price rakh sako aaj 12000 hai kal 13000 hoga to aapke IndiaMART ke employee ko bol ke thodi na karwaoge sahi aapko karna aana chahiye ab aap raton raat man lo koi price change hua.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa na ye cheeze maine kal hi note kari hai inko to main sabko theek kar dunga. Aap keh rahe hain na.
Executive: Dekhiye isme aa raha hai ye aap agar niche ki taraf jayenge. Haan sir. Four way feeder panel feeder pillar. Ek minute ek minute by leads mein ja raha hai kahin niche. Nahi nahi jo jo product add kar rakhe hain na unhone. Theek hai sir theek hai haan haan. Isme jo mere ko nahi chahiye honge isko main hata dunga yahan se. Haan bilkul hata dijiyega. Ho sakta hai jo ye jo team hai designing wali team product badhane ke liye kuch product do char dal diye ho alag ye bhi ho sakta hai jaise ab mujhe kya hai jaise sir maine aapke profile mein kya dekha ki aapke paas na ye high mast lightning pole hai wo bhi alag alag meters ke jaise 12 meter 18 meter 20 22 jaise jo bhi 16 wala na fir octagonal pole bhi matlab hai basically do hi product aapke paas ghum fir ke bas meter change kara gaya 3 meter 7 meter 5 meter. Ab aap dekhiye abhi ek just inquiry aayi hai 40 watt solar street light with panel. Haan sir aa hi to hai. Theek hai ab ye hamare ko use bhi nahi hai. Main bataun sir kya ho raha hai. Dekho achha aap kahan pe dekh rahe ho mobile mein ya laptop pe? Abhi to main filhal mobile pe hi dekh raha hun. Waise ye jo lead aapko dikha rahi hai ya aapke kaam ki nahi hai yahan pehle hi likh ke aa raha hai no relevant by lead found showing other by leads showing other leads you may like matlab jaruri nahi wo aapke kaam ki ho. To ye jab aap IndiaMART ka website chala rahe hote na to wahan likh ke aata hai ki koi relevant by lead nahi dikhi hai showing other by leads. 16 ghante pehle ki street light installation service haan Shahjahanpur haan dekha dekha dekha. Solar street light to nahi hai aapke paas na sir? Nahi solar street light hai hamare paas. Achha bas wo doori hai is wajah se nahi lete aap. Maine aapko wahi bataya na inme quantity nahi aati hai lambi. Theek hai dusra fir aap dekho abhi abhi Firozabad ki hai solar street light ek piece ye to ek hi piece ki hai likha hai lekin ye wali Shahjahanpur wali le sakte hain sir wo business use ke liye hai jaruri nahi hai ek hi lagwaye. Sir wo Shahjahanpur wali installation service hai wo sirf. Chalo samajh gaya. Samajh gaya samajh gaya samajh gaya haan. Uske baad aap dekhiye ye Bageshwar ki aa rakhi hai Uttarakhand ki 5 meter GI pole solar street light pole quantity. Haan haan haan. Ek piece do piece ki aa rahi samajh gaya main aapki baat. Theek hai solar street light chahiye unko 50 watt ki. Hmm. Chahiye hi nahi theek hai. Uske baad niche Assam ki aaiye ek quantity. Fir uske baad aap Gujarat ki aa jaiye ek quantity. Fir Tamil Nadu ek quantity. Fir ye Odisha ki hai ek quantity. Ab value dekhiye na sir kya kya karunga main inka. Haan haan haan. Ab ye Bijnor ki aayi hai niche solar street lights quantity ek piece. Ye sari inquiry matlab wo ye 5000 7000 rupees ki hai. Hmm hmm. Isse isse mera kuch benefit bhi to nahi hai na koi lega hi nahi koi ha hi nahi karega door ki wajah se mana kar denge sab. Hmm hmm hmm. Waise hum log check kar rahe the pata nahi bahut jyada competition bahut jyada hai aapka is product product mein. Sir product mein competition to rehta hi rehta hai sir lekin ek baat bataun sir main other company mein kaam kar chuka hun lekin itna itna wo kahin nahi jaata leads wagera aati hai. Hmm hmm hmm. Sir main yahi pe dekh raha hun ki is wale package mein jabki agar ye maximize wala bhi nahi lete to fir to ye bhi nahi aati hamare paas iska matlab. Kya cheez nahi aata sir lead ya call? Lead ya call to fir to itni bhi nahi aati ye jo leads aa rahi hai ek ek pole. Nahi nahi lead sir to agar aap ye soch rahe ho ki star lead kisi ne le rakha hoga to usko lead jo hai jyada quantity ke dikha rahi hogi aisa kuch nahi hai wo bhi same issue face kar raha hai. Ab issue main kyun keh raha hun same issue issue issue maine kyun bola ye shabd kyun bola main aapko batata hun abhi aap laptop ya desktop se nahi chala rahe ho nahi to ek option aata hai past leads ka agar jab aap past leads mein ja ke dekhoge na to abhi dekhiye Bhopal se jaise 20 watt ka solar street light karke kuch ek do minute pehle 10 piece ki lead jo hai sold out ho gayi hai do hi minute hua. To ho kya raha hai. To wo paanch paanch aadmi consume kar sakte hain isko wo to mere ko pata hai. To wo bahut transaction jo hai sir bahut tezi se ho raha hai bahut jyada active rehna padega apne profile pe. Wo to iske upar har ek second ke andar click refresh karke wo karna padega. Haan thoda sa active rahenge aur jo bhi lead manager mein data aa raha hai thoda usko reply reply jyada kare teen teen reply kare. Hai na taki aapka visibility thodi increase kare sirf utna sa. Theek hai achha kuch inquiry direct bhi aati hai lead manager mein. Dheeme dheeme dheeme dheeme start hoga sir abhi immediately nahi aayega aapke liye. To lagbhag kitna aapke liye kaam ek dedh mahina to sir abhi jayega aapke promotion mein starting mein sir. Ye to aap man ke chalo seedhi baat main aapko bolna gumrah karke to bolne mein to ek hafta do hafta bhi kar sakta hun aapke liye. Hmm. Haan thoda na time lagta hi hai aapka website ka jo bana hai na sir usme dheeme dheeme jo hai growth aati hai. Aur website achchi bani hai score score achcha hai 82.5 hai. Kuch kamiyan hai jo main abhi thoda sahi karunga aapke account pe jo mujhe lag raha hai jo. Ji. Hai na mapping ko lekar ke jise aap keh sakte ho aur aviation light ka kya karna hai sir matlab iski isko aap kaam karoge na ispe matlab isko aap sell karoge na? Main wo main wo to maine kar diya. Theek hai theek hai. Haan 1400 1400 kar diya hai maine abhi dono ko theek hai. Sir ye to aaya hamara ye jo price ye jo price hai ye to main baith ke check karke kaun kaun sa sahi hai kaun sa galat hai. Haan ab sir dekho ek cheez aur hoti hai man lo koi high mast pole aapka man lo 51000 pada hai aur 20 25 hi hajar mein aata hoga dusra seller 20 25 hi hajar mein sell kar rahe honge. Theek hai example le raha hun. To wo buyer aapke paas to call lagayega hi nahi na agar wo competitive price nahi dekhega dekhega price inka bahut high hai aur dusre log sasta bech rahe hai aapko kyun call lagayega. Hmm. Hai ki nahi to humko ek bar thoda sa market mein jo website hai na aap as a buyer search karo pehle high mast pole aur ye bhi observe karo ki dusre seller kitne kitne rupay mein bech rahe hain. Wo to wo to wo sab to mere ko idea hai sir. Chalo wo sab to idea hai hi aapko ek bar fir wo karke fir apna price set karna. Theek hai. Hai na abhi starting mein thoda time lagta hai lekin main bhi chahunga ki aapke sath laga rahun taki jo bhi jitni jaldi ho sake kuch business bane nahi to fir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Low lead quality; mostly single pole inquiries.

- Transportation costs negate profit on small orders.

- Inquiries are from distant locations.

- No direct calls received in the past week.

- Feeder panel listed despite not being offered.

- LED aviation light price incorrect.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the customer's concerns.

- Executive reduced the price of LED aviation light.

- Executive explained how to edit product details.

- Executive stated that visibility will increase over time.

- Executive advised to reply to leads.

- Executive advised to check competitor pricing.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the account for improvements.

- Customer will correct product details.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, pricing, product details, visibility
